pkgmetadata.longdescription: Communicating with AWS EC2 and ECS using AWS REST APIs // Providing the functions for communicating with Amazon Web Services(AWS) Elastic Compute Cloud(EC2) and Elastic Container Service(ECS). The functions will have the prefix 'ecs_' or 'ec2_' depending on the class of the API. The request will be sent via the REST API and the parameters are given by the function argument. The credentials can be set via 'aws_set_credentials'. The EC2 documentation can be found at ht tps://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/Welcome.ht ml and ECS can be found at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonEC S/latest/APIReference/Welcome.html.
